Which payment option do we accept ?

We accept bitcoin, paypal, visa, mastercard, and wire.

How about maintenance ?

We're still here to keep your site secure, and ofcourse you'll gwt documentation.

Can we request feature or revision ?

Ofcourse, you have 5x limited request for feature or revision.

How about license ?

We're here to create design for you, so everything is for you.

Can we refund ?

If you would cancel order, you'll get 100% money back after 30days.

What if i lost my design ?

We provide permanent link for clients, so you'll get it back anytime. But we recommend to backup design in your own device, or cloud services.
